title: A Wind Named Amnesia (Dub)
alternative_title: Kaze no Na wa Amnesia, Kaze no Namae wa Amunejia,風の名はアムネジア
description: It happened quite suddenly, with no warning - all the memories of all the people on Earth, swept away as if by a sudden wind. In a post-catastrophic Earth populated mostly by savages without memories of their past civilisation, one man travels on a journey of enlightenment and hope, across a devastated America.
